project.description: Once Harmonized Patient Mapping is generated this job will generate the harmonized all concepts file.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Managed Inputs aws s3 cp ${managed_input} data/
IFS=$'\r\n' GLOBIGNORE='*' command eval 'studyids=($(cut -d , -f 1 data/Managed_Inputs.csv | grep -v Study\ Abbr | uniq))'
mkdir data mkdir completed mkdir hierarchies mkdir processing
echo '### Building DCC Harmonized data set'
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/data/ data/ --recursive
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/resources/job.config resources/
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/mappings/mapping.csv mappings/
echo "" echo "#### Building Harmonized files ####" echo ""
java -jar GenerateAllConcepts.jar -propertiesfile resources/job.config -mappingskipheaders N
aws s3 cp completed/HRMN_allConcepts.csv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/hrmn/completed/HRMN_allConcepts.csv
